mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT (title, content, start_date, end_date, views, created_date, address) VALUES (#{title}, #{content}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{views}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, #{address})
mapper.select: SELECT e.*, f.saved_name AS imagePath FROM EVENT e LEFT JOIN EVENT_FILES f ON e.event_no = f.event_no ORDER BY e.created_date DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO EVENT_FILES (event_no, original_name, saved_name) VALUES (#{eventNo}, #{originalName}, #{savedName})
mapper.select: SELECT e.*, f.saved_name AS imagePath FROM EVENT e LEFT JOIN EVENT_FILES f ON e.event_no = f.event_no WHERE e.event_no = #{eventNo}
mapper.update: UPDATE EVENT SET title = #{title}, content = #{content}, address = #{address}, start_date = #{startDate}, end_date = #{endDate} WHERE event_no = #{eventNo}
